info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, Queens, Richmond and Kings Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Todt Hill, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Flatbush, Bayonne, Linden, Coney Island, Rockaway Beach, Todt Hill, Crown Heights, Kennedy Airport, The Verrazano Narrows Bridge, Forest Hills, Canarsie, Bay Ridge, Port Richmond, Howard Beach and Ozone Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
